topic.title: Zone-telechargement.com closed then re-opened
topic.body:
this French direct download website has been closed on Monday november 28th then has re-opened on tuesday. The protection link service DL-protect.com is still unreachable. 
I found and used another website which uses direct download links: www.extreme-down.me
For torrents, piratebay is still existing. For French torrents, there is: www.cpasbien.me
About Zeronet, magnet links are always available of course! 
Ask me something if you have questions! Ciao

1_1FEikAyxCNPJcW996B69r5UFg29yfq579m.body: Hi! I run Zeronet on a Nexus 5 in a Kali Linux Nethunter chroot environnment.. It works like a charm. You can launch it in a terminal then you open a web browser page to navigate! If you want a tutorial, send me a zeromail ;)
